summary: The beginings of the Algerian Revolution as seen through the eyes of a peasant.
cast: Yorgo Voyagis|Mohammed Lakhdar-Hamina|Leila Shenna|Cheikh Nourredine|François Maistre|Yahia Ben Mabrouk|Hacène Benzerari|Henri Czarniak|Hassan El Amir|Mohamed Hadj Smaïn|Brahim Hadjadj|Hassan Hassani|Mohammed Kouiret|Sid Ali Kouiret|Notis Pitsilos|Abdelhalim Rais|Jacques Richard|Sissani|Nadia Talbi|Larbi Zekkal
title: Ahdat sanawovach el-djamr
